actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1295.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 12432) to extend the Commission on Civil Rights for five years, to authorize appropriations for the Commission, to effect certain technical changes to comply with changes in the law, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 12432 (Civil Rights Commission).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 12432) to extend the Commission on Civil Rights for five years, to authorize appropriations for the Commission, to effect certain technical changes to comply with changes in the law, and for other purposes.
